description: When attempting to import the heapq module, a FileNotFoundError is raised, indicating that the module could not be found in the system's search path. This can be caused by an incorrect module name, an incorrect installation path, or an incorrect version of the module.
code:
import heapq

# Create a list of numbers
nums = [1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

# Heapify the list of numbers
heapq.heapify(nums)
